channel.title: Nautica Village - Looking For Villagers
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Nautica Village - Looking For Villagers" - Brand New Village, Looking For Fresh New Faces

item.title: Nautica Village - Looking For Villagers
item.content:encoded:
Nautica Village has just been created and needs more members to grow and develop.

My alt Kagekiri is in this village and I make an effort to be as helpful as possible to my fellow players (Just started Season 2 with Kagekiri actually). So if you're new and decide to join our village, don't be hesitant to ask questions or request assistance.
